name: Bradley Langford
title: Assistant Professor (Part-Time), Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact
overview: Dr. Brad Langford is a board certified infectious diseases pharmacist and antimicrobial stewardship pharmacist specialist at Public Health Ontario and Hotel Dieu Shaver Health and Rehabilitation Centre.  He is also an associate editor at the journal Antimicrobial Stewardship and Healthcare Epidemiology. His practice and research interests include antibiotic use and resistance surveillance, knowledge translation and implementation science in stewardship, and evaluation of initiatives to improve the quality and safety of antibiotic use in all health care settings.
